[Inspect Evals](https://ukgovernmentbeis.github.io/inspect_evals/) is a repository of community contributed evaluations featuring implementations of many popular benchmarks and papers. 

These evaluations demonstrate a wide variety of evaluation types and techniques. If you have just begun learning Inspect, you might benefit from reviewing the [Tutorial](../tutorial.qmd) examples before exploring these.

::: {#evals}
